subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Radek Dvorak and David Booth scored 1 minutes 17 seconds apart early in the third period and the backup goalie Craig Anderson made 31 saves Friday night for the Florida Panthers in a 2-1 victory over the Devils in Newark.
snippet: Radek Dvorak and David Booth scored 1 minutes 17 seconds apart early in the third period and the backup goalie Craig Anderson made 31 saves Friday night for the Florida Panthers in a 2-1 victory over the Devils in Newark.
